## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.toggleClass() method

Toggles one or more classes on the given element or list of elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toggleClass(el: Element | NodeListOf<Element>, clazz: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | Element \| NodeListOf&lt;Element&gt; | Element, or list of elements on which to toggle the class(es) |
|  clazz | string | A space separated list of classes to toggle. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
